author: norman
msg: Add some fastfail handler which will disconnect the client after X unknown commands

author: norman
msg: Move the encoding logic out of the netty code and place it in AbstractProtocolTransport which should be used as starting point when you implement your own ProtocolTransport implementation. See PROTOCOLS-33

author: rwesten
msg: deactivated the German Tokenizer because it sometimes create wrong tokens such as including leading and tailing " to words (e.g. "Kung Fu Panda" -> ["Kung, Fu, Panda"]
